#summary Console command: dictionary keys
#labels console,dictionary

= Dictionary keys =

Display all the keys stored in the database dictionary.

== Syntax ==

{{{dictionary keys}}}

== Example ==

{{{
> dictionary keys

Found 4 keys:
#0: key-148
#1: key-147
#2: key-146
#3: key-145
}}}

To load the associated record use the [ConsoleCommandDictionaryGet dictionary get] {{{<key>}}}.

For complete index (and dictionary) guide look at [Indexes Index guide].

This is a command of the Orient console. To know all the commands go to [ConsoleCommands Console commands].
